hello and warm welcome to all: quick question (i've posted to the forums but not yet had a reply): if i cancel a distribution upgrade midway through fetching the packages (and don't shutdown the computer) will it be ok and if i restart the upgrade later today it should be fine? yes?
yes. You will be fine. If you do not wish to do the upgrade and need to recover the drive space: $ sudo rm *.deb /var/cache/apt/archives
